name: oraksoft-tw-css-lib
description: Oraksoft Tailwind CSS Library - a portion of mostly used Tailwind CSS classes

scripts.build: powershell -Command "if (!(Test-Path dist)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path dist }; Copy-Item -Path src\*.css -Destination dist\ -Force"
scripts.watch: powershell -Command "Write-Host 'Watching src/ for changes... Press Ctrl+C to stop'; while ($true) { Copy-Item -Path src\*.css -Destination dist\ -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Start-Sleep -Seconds 1 }"

author: Oraksoft
